text:
Hi,
I would like to (set) limit the number of records returned in a
`{% set queryparam = queryparam ~ "&orderBy=-hs_id" %}`       
`{% set table = hubdb_table_rows(module.table_lookup, queryparam) %}`       

how do go about doing this?

Thanks,
Riki
Hello to all. I have a page under two different parents in the main menu but the breadcrumb always shows the first parent. Is there a way to fix this?
You tell HubSpot about the interaction
HubSpot will create a placeholder id but you will need to update it with all the pertinent info
